        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:fnbe.profium.com:http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/showfile.php?id=314&file=314_suihkua-kasiin.jpg</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>fnbe</catalog>
            <entry>http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/showfile.php?id=314&file=314_suihkua-kasiin.jpg</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fi">Suihkusaippuaa käsiin</string>
            <string language="en">Shower soap to one’s hands</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Duscheseife zu den one?s Händen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Savon de douche aux mains d'one?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sabão do chuveiro às mãos dos one?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sapone dell'acquazzone alle mani dei one?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σαπούνι ντους στα χέρια one?s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jabón de la ducha a las manos de los one?s</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Viivapiirros, jossa laitetaan suihkusaippuaa käsiin, osa kuvasarjaa suihkussa käymisestä.</string>
            <string language="en">Line drawing which shows applying shower soap to one’s hands, part of an image series of taking a shower.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnen Sie das Zeichnen, dem die Erscheinen, 
die Dusche anwenden, zu den one?s Hände einseifen, Teil einer 
Bildreihe des Nehmens einer Dusche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayez le dessin que les expositions appliquant la
douche savonnent aux one?s des mains, une partie d'une série d'image 
de prendre une douche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alinhe desenhar que as mostras que aplicam o 
chuveiro ensaboam aos one?s as mãos, parte de uma série da imagem de
fazer exame de um chuveiro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Allinei dissipare che le esposizioni che 
applicano l'acquazzone insaponano ai one?s le mani facente parte una 
serie di immagine di presa dell'acquazzone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο γραμμών που εμφανίζει "Εφαρμογή" του σαπουνιού
ντους one?s στα χέρια, μέρος μιας σειράς εικόνας λήψης ενός 
ντους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alinee trazar que las demostraciones que aplican 
la ducha jabonen a los one?s las manos, parte de una serie de la 
imagen de tomar una ducha.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
